headline: How The Markel Group (MKL) Narrative Is Shifting With New Targets And Buybacks
summary: Markel Group’s latest analyst update lifts the price target by about US$100, moving fair value from US$2,064.25 to US$2,071.75, a small change that still matters if you are tracking valuation closely. Bullish and cautious voices are reading this shift differently, with some treating it as confirmation of an already supportive view and others seeing it as only a modest tweak. As you read on, you will see how to interpret these moves and keep up with the evolving narrative around Markel...
